titleStmt.title: A terrible battell betweene the two consumers of the whole world: time, and death. By Samuell Rowlands
titleStmt.author: Rowlands, Samuel, 1570?-1630?

publicationStmt.publisher: [By W. Jaggard] for Iohn Deane, and are to be sold at his shop..,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A bloudy battell betweene time and death.
Printer and suggested publication date from STC.
Title page closely cropped, affecting imprint date.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
